(Megatron looks like a shrunken version of G1 Megs, right?)


Unitron:



Unitron watched Speedbreaker leave and then looked to the robot calling 
himself Megatron.  "So you are the supposed Megatron?  You look lime him, 
I'll give you that.  But how can we be sure you are indeed the real Megatron? 
 He was changed into that fool Galvatron.  How is it you live?"
